TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit MailDefinition extends System.Object implements class System.Web.UI.IStateManager
Public NotInheritable Class MailDefinition Implements IStateManager
public ref class MailDefinition sealed : System::Web::UI::IStateManager

summary.span: 允許控制項從文字檔案或字串建立電子郵件訊息。

span.span: Allows a control to create email messages from text files or strings.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別可以用控制項來建立來自文字檔案或字串，包含電子郵件訊息的主體物件。The class can be used by controls to create a object from a text file or a string that contains the body of the email message. 使用類別，以簡化建立預先定義的控制項所傳送的電子郵件訊息。Use the class to simplify creating predefined email messages to be sent by a control. 如果您想要傳送電子郵件不使用控制項，請參閱類別。If you want to send email not using a control, see the class. 您可以讓文字替代電子郵件訊息主體中傳遞至方法字串對應至其取代項目執行個體。You can make text substitutions in the body of the email message by passing to the method an instance that maps strings to their replacements. 所建立的物件類別會使用傳送方法類別。The object created by the class is sent using the method of the class. 若要能夠傳送電子郵件，您必須在 Web.config 檔案中設定 SMTP 郵件伺服器。To be able to send email, you must configure an SMTP mail server in your Web.config file. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ <smtp>項目 （網路設定）](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/network/smtp-element-network-settings.md)。For more information, see the [<smtp> Element (Network Settings)](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/network/smtp-element-network-settings.md). > [!NOTE] > 類別不支援資料繫結。The class does not support data binding. 屬性無法使用資料繫結類別`<%# %>`資料繫結運算式語法。Properties of the class cannot be bound to data using the `<%# %>` data-binding expression syntax. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會建立網際網路電子郵件訊息從 Web Form 頁面。The following code example creates an Internet email message from a Web Forms page. 您可以在表單中輸入訊息的文字，或輸入要做為郵件的本文文字檔案的名稱。You can either enter the text of the message in the form or enter the name of a text file to use as the body of the mail. 程式碼會定義訊息的兩個字串取代： 表單的文字方塊中的收件者清單會取代字串"\<%到 %>"，並在指定的文字屬性將會取代字串"\<從 %%>"。The code defines two string replacements for the message: the recipient list from the form's To text box will replace the string "\<%To%>", and the text specified in the property will replace the string "\<%From%>". 您可以在此程式碼會產生 Web Form 頁面上，按一下**建立電子郵件，並且只顯示**來建立電子郵件訊息並顯示的屬性網頁中的物件。On the Web Forms page that this code generates, you can click **Create email and display only** to create an email message and display the properties of the object in the Web page. 按一下 **建立電子郵件並傳送**網頁中顯示的電子郵件訊息和傳送訊息至使用網際網路電子郵件的收件者。Click **Create email and send** to both display the email message in the Web page and send the message to the recipients using Internet email. > [!IMPORTANT] > 這個控制項具有接受使用者輸入，也就是潛在的安全性威脅的文字方塊。This control has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 根據預設，ASP.NET Web 網頁會驗證使用者輸入未包含指令碼或 HTML 項目。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [Script Exploits Overview](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07) (指令碼攻擊概觀)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). [!code-aspx-csharp[MailDefinitionClassSample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MailDefinitionClassSample/CS/maildefinitionsamplecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[MailDefinitionClassSample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MailDefinitionClassSample/VB/maildefinitionsamplevb.aspx#1)]

Attribute.AttributeName: set: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 取得或設定包含電子郵件內文文字的檔案名稱。

span.span: Gets or sets the name of the file that contains text for the body of the email message.

value.span: 包含訊息主體文字之檔案的名稱。

span.span: The name of the file that contains the message body text.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性會指定要用於電子郵件訊息的本文文字檔案的位置。The property specifies the location of the text file to use for the body of the email message. 方法會使用其`owner`參數，以對應屬性，以在伺服器上的路徑。The method uses its `owner` parameter to map the property to a path on the server. 如果`owner`參數指向的.aspx 頁面上的控制項或指向網頁本身，屬性會指向.aspx 頁面相同目錄中的文字檔案。If the `owner` parameter points to a control on an .aspx page or to the page itself, the property points to a text file in the same directory as the .aspx page. 例如，如果.aspx 頁面位於 C:\inetpub\wwwroot\default.aspx，控制項看起來就在 C:\inetpub\wwwroot 目錄中的文字檔。For example, if the .aspx page is located at C:\inetpub\wwwroot\default.aspx, the control looks for the text file in the directory C:\inetpub\wwwroot. 如果類別用來在.ascx 檔案中，包含使用者控制項屬性會指向位於使用者控制項相同的目錄中的文字檔案。If the class is used in a user control contained in an .ascx file, the property points to a text file located in the same directory as the user control. 例如，如果位於 C:\inetpub\wwwroot\default.aspx.aspx 頁面和使用者控制項位於 C:\inetpub\wwwroot\controls\control.aspx，物件會尋找 C:\inetpub\wwwroot\controls 目錄中的文字檔案。For example, if the .aspx page is located at C:\inetpub\wwwroot\default.aspx and the user control is at C:\inetpub\wwwroot\controls\control.aspx, the object looks for the text file in the directory C:\inetpub\wwwroot\controls. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會設定屬性中輸入的文字Web Form 網頁上的控制項。The following code example sets the property to the text entered in a control on a Web Forms page. 此程式碼範例是針對提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[MailDefinitionClassSample#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MailDefinitionClassSample/CS/maildefinitionsamplecs.aspx#3)] [!code-vb[MailDefinitionClassSample#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MailDefinitionClassSample/VB/maildefinitionsamplevb.aspx#3)]

member this.CC : string with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定電子郵件地址的逗號分隔清單，用於接收訊息的副本 (CC)。

span.span: Gets or sets a comma-separated list of email addresses to send a copy (CC) of the message to.

value.span: 要傳送之訊息的副本 (CC) 的電子郵件地址的逗號分隔清單。

span.span: A comma-separated list of email addresses to send a copy (CC) of the message to.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性包含的電子郵件訊息的其他收件者清單。The property contains a list of additional recipients of the email message. 如果屬性包含格式不正確的電子郵件地址方法會擲回不會傳送例外狀況和電子郵件訊息。If the property contains an improperly formed email address, the method throws an exception and the email message is not sent. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會設定屬性中輸入的文字Web Form 網頁上的控制項。The following code example sets the property to the text entered in a control on a Web Forms page. 此程式碼範例是針對提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[MailDefinitionClassSample#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MailDefinitionClassSample/CS/maildefinitionsamplecs.aspx#4)] [!code-vb[MailDefinitionClassSample#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MailDefinitionClassSample/VB/maildefinitionsamplevb.aspx#4)]

summary.span: 建立要透過 SMTP (簡易郵件傳輸通訊協定) 傳送的電子郵件訊息。

span.span: Creates an email message to send by means of SMTP (Simple Mail Transfer Protocol).

MemberSignature.Value: public System.Net.Mail.MailMessage CreateMailMessage (string recipients, System.Collections.IDictionary replacements, System.Web.UI.Control owner);

.method public hidebysig instance class System.Net.Mail.MailMessage CreateMailMessage(string recipients, class System.Collections.IDictionary replacements, class System.Web.UI.Control owner) cil managed
Public Function CreateMailMessage (recipients As String, replacements As IDictionary, owner As Control) As MailMessage
public: System::Net::Mail::MailMessage ^ CreateMailMessage(System::String ^ recipients, System::Collections::IDictionary ^ replacements, System::Web::UI::Control ^ owner);
member this.CreateMailMessage : string * System.Collections.IDictionary * System.Web.UI.Control -> System.Net.Mail.MailMessage

param.name: recipients
param.span: 訊息收件者的逗號分隔清單。

span.span: A comma-separated list of message recipients.

param.name: replacements
param.span: ，包含字串及其取代字串的清單。

span.span: An containing a list of strings and their replacement strings.
The that owns this .

summary.span: 從文字檔建立要透過 SMTP (簡易郵件傳輸通訊協定) 傳送的電子郵件訊息。

span.span: Creates an email message from a text file to send by means of SMTP (Simple Mail Transfer Protocol).

returns.span: 來自文字檔案的電子郵件訊息。

span.span: The email message from a text file.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法建立新物件，可以使用傳送方法。The method creates a new object that can be sent using the method. 屬性必須設為指出郵件訊息是否應格式化為純文字 () 或 HTML ()。The property must be set to indicate whether the mail message should be formatted as plain text () or HTML (). `recipients`參數會包含以逗號分隔的電子郵件訊息的收件者清單。The `recipients` parameter contains a comma-separated list of recipients of the email message. 如果`recipients`參數包含格式不正確的網際網路電子郵件地址，方法會擲回不會傳送例外狀況和電子郵件訊息。If the `recipients` parameter contains an improperly formatted Internet email address, the method throws an exception and the email message is not sent. `replacements`參數是執行個體，包含要取代的字串清單。The `replacements` parameter is an instance that contains a list of strings to substitute. 取代字串中已新增到的順序集合，而且它們也可以覆寫先前的替代項目。Strings are replaced in the order in which they were added to the collection, and they can overwrite earlier replacements. `owner`參數會指出哪一個控制項是父代控制項。The `owner` parameter indicates which control is the parent of the control. 它會決定要搜尋的文字檔案中指定的目錄屬性。It determines which directory to search for the text file specified in the property. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會建立物件，定義兩個字串 ("\<%到 %>"和"\<從 %%>")，會取代電子郵件訊息中。The following code example creates a object that defines two strings ("\<%To%>" and "\<%From%>") that are replaced in the email message. 此程式碼範例是針對提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[MailDefinitionClassSample#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MailDefinitionClassSample/CS/maildefinitionsamplecs.aspx#7)] [!code-vb[MailDefinitionClassSample#7](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MailDefinitionClassSample/VB/maildefinitionsamplevb.aspx#7)] 下列程式碼範例使用方法用來建立新的電子郵件訊息的文字檔案。The following code example uses the method to create a new email message from a text file. 此程式碼範例是針對提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[MailDefinitionClassSample#8](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MailDefinitionClassSample/CS/maildefinitionsamplecs.aspx#8)] [!code-vb[MailDefinitionClassSample#8](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MailDefinitionClassSample/VB/maildefinitionsamplevb.aspx#8)]

span.span: does not contain strings.

exception.span: 組態檔之 SMTP 區段中的 值為 或空字串。

span.span: The value in the SMTP section of the configuration file is or the empty string
-or-

exception.span: 包含不正確的電子郵件地址。

span.span: contains an incorrect email address.
is .

summary.span: 從文字檔使用取代文字建立要透過 SMTP (簡易郵件傳輸通訊協定) 傳送的電子郵件訊息。

span.span: Creates an email message with replacements from a text file to send by means of SMTP (Simple Mail Transfer Protocol).

returns.span: 含有來自文字檔案之取代項目的電子郵件訊息。

span.span: The email message with replacements from a text file.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法建立新物件，可以傳送與方法。The method creates a new object that can be sent with the method. `recipients`參數會包含以逗號分隔的電子郵件訊息的收件者清單。The `recipients` parameter contains a comma-separated list of recipients of the email message. 如果`recipients`參數包含格式不正確的網際網路電子郵件地址，方法會擲回不會傳送例外狀況和電子郵件訊息。If the `recipients` parameter contains an improperly formatted Internet email address, the method throws an exception and the email message is not sent. `replacements`參數是執行個體，包含要取代的字串清單。The `replacements` parameter is an instance that contains a list of strings to substitute. 取代字串中已新增到的順序集合，而且它們也可以覆寫先前的替代項目。Strings are replaced in the order in which they were added to the collection, and they can overwrite earlier replacements. `body`參數包含電子郵件訊息的文字。The `body` parameter contains the text of the email message. `owner`參數會指出哪一個控制項是父代控制項。The `owner` parameter indicates which control is the parent of the control. 它會決定要搜尋的文字檔案中指定的目錄屬性。It determines which directory to search for the text file specified in the property. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會建立物件，定義兩個字串 ("\<%到 %>"和"\<從 %%>")，會取代電子郵件訊息中。The following code example creates a object that defines two strings ("\<%To%>" and "\<%From%>") that are replaced in the email message. 此程式碼範例是針對提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[MailDefinitionClassSample#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MailDefinitionClassSample/CS/maildefinitionsamplecs.aspx#7)] [!code-vb[MailDefinitionClassSample#7](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MailDefinitionClassSample/VB/maildefinitionsamplevb.aspx#7)] 下列程式碼範例會使用方法用來建立新的電子郵件訊息從文字方塊中輸入Web Form 網頁上的控制項。The following code example uses the method to create a new email message from text entered in a control on a Web Forms page. 此程式碼範例是針對提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[MailDefinitionClassSample#8](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MailDefinitionClassSample/CS/maildefinitionsamplecs.aspx#8)] [!code-vb[MailDefinitionClassSample#8](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MailDefinitionClassSample/VB/maildefinitionsamplevb.aspx#8)]

summary.span: 取得 執行個體的集合，通常用於在將電子郵件傳送至使用者之前，將影像嵌入 物件。

span.span: Gets a collection of instances, typically used to embed images in a object before sending an email to a user.

value.span: 執行個體用來將影像嵌入再將電子郵件傳送給使用者的物件。

span.span: An instances used to embed images in a object before sending an email to a user.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 中的項目所傳回的集合屬性代表電子郵件中內嵌的項目。The items in the collection returned by the property represent items to embed in an email message. 這些項目可以包含影像檔案，例如公司標誌或其他圖形。These items can include image files such as company logos or other graphics.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性包含在電子郵件訊息寄件者電子郵件地址。The property contains the email address of the sender of the email message. 如果屬性保留空白，或包含格式不正確的電子郵件地址方法會擲回不會傳送例外狀況和電子郵件訊息。If the property is left blank, or contains an improperly formed email address, the method throws an exception and the email message is not sent. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會設定屬性中輸入的文字Web Form 網頁上的控制項。The following code example sets the property to the text entered in a control on a Web Forms page. 此程式碼範例是針對提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. value.span: 如果標記控制項以儲存其狀態，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the control is marked to save its state; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個成員是明確介面成員實作，This member is an explicit interface member implementation. 只有在 執行個體轉換成 介面時，才能使用這個成員。It can be used only when the instance is cast to an interface. > [!NOTE] > 並屬性不會儲存在屬性。The and properties are not saved in the property.

param.name: savedState
param.span: ，代表所要還原的控制項狀態。

span.span: An that represents the control state to be restored.

summary.span: 從 方法所儲存的先前頁面要求來還原檢視狀態資訊。

span.span: Restores view-state information from a previous page request that was saved by the method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個成員是明確介面成員實作，This member is an explicit interface member implementation. 只有在 執行個體轉換成 介面時，才能使用這個成員。It can be used only when the instance is cast to an interface.

Function SaveViewState () As Object Implements IStateManager.SaveViewState

summary.span: 儲存自頁面回傳至伺服器以來所發生的任何伺服器控制項檢視狀態變更。

span.span: Saves any server control view-state changes that have occurred since the time the page was posted back to the server.

returns.span: 伺服器控制項的目前檢視狀態。

span.span: The server control's current view state.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個成員是明確介面成員實作，This member is an explicit interface member implementation. 只有在 執行個體轉換成 介面時，才能使用這個成員。It can be used only when the instance is cast to an interface.

MemberSignature.Value: .method hidebysig newslot virtual instance void System.Web.UI.IStateManager.TrackViewState() cil managed

summary.span: 導致對伺服器控制項的檢視狀態變更的追蹤 (Tracking)，以便它們能夠儲存於伺服器控制項的 物件。

span.span: Causes tracking of view-state changes to the server control so they can be stored in the server control's object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個成員是明確介面成員實作，This member is an explicit interface member implementation. 只有在 執行個體轉換成 介面時，才能使用這個成員。It can be used only when the instance is cast to an interface.
